name: Macabre Adventures of Fornix, the Lobe
name_original: Macabre Adventures of Fornix, the Lobe
description:
Game submitted to Butterscotch ShenaniJam 2019 under the theme of DNA Chaos

WASD (Or arrow keys to move)

SPACE to Jump

You have to kill yourself to return to the main HUB (Sorry, we reeeeeeealy had no time left to a nice explanation in game)
